Interactions.content: Can you suggest a thriller novel that involves assembling a device from common household items, with a protagonist named Sam?

Title: "Sam's Blueprint: The Dominoes of Destruction"

A high-stakes thriller that involves assembling a deadly device from common household items, the novel follows the life of Sam, an ordinary man with an extraordinary intellect.

Sam's life takes an unexpected turn when he finds an encrypted blueprint, hidden within a vintage jigsaw puzzle, left behind by his late father. This blueprint describes a lethal device that can be assembled from everyday household items and will have catastrophic consequences when triggered.

As Sam delves deeper into the mystery, he faces a race against time to understand the puzzle's secrets before the deadly device falls into the wrong hands. His journey leads him through a labyrinth of clues, hidden messages, and dangerous enemies, each step bringing him closer to unlocking the truth about his father's past and the terrible fate he sought to avoid.

Along the way, Sam finds allies in unexpected places – a tech-savvy girl named Ava, a reclusive inventor named Ben, and a mysterious figure known only as The Architect. Together, this unlikely team must navigate a world of danger, betrayal, and secrets, uncovering the truth behind the sinister plan and stopping it before it's too late.

Filled with unforgettable characters, edge-of-your-seat suspense, and ingenious puzzles, "Sam's Blueprint" is a thrilling tale of family secrets, hidden identities, and the power of the human spirit to stand against all odds.
